showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ star because there is no option for zero star. Mangaer name DJ and worker JON were very rude they said they can‚Äôt give shower to my co driver because i was fueling up at one of pumps. They want me to move the truck before giving shower ‚Ä¶

Stopped in for a shower which cost me $17 and while using facilities a friend of mine that was waiting on me informed me that one of the female cashier's was leaned up against the door listening to a phone conversation I was having while in ‚Ä¶

Friendly staff and very helpful. But this is the tiniest Pilot I've ever seen. Hard to get to the pumps, no parking what so ever, and only one shower. Good news, shower was clean and big. Good people working there.
I had to take a shower here and didn't have a shower at the place I lived cause the water pipes were broke, and they really treated me great
Great, there was fresh food available and clean bathrooms. There's also a shower if someone needed it. The lady at the register tonight was very friendly and professional as well! üíö ‚Ä¶
Truckers never stop here smallest pilot No parking that means no shower 3 pumps long waiting for fuel, Not easy to back to main rd to I 40

Nice place. There is  parking across the street by KFC
1 SHOWER clean
Prices are competitive, only one(1) shower!!?
Pilot is always there when you need fuel coffee or a shower
1 shower on truck stop, nice joke!

locations.title: Love's Travel Stop
locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Everything is good but im stop here take a break and shower üöø but water is not good for showers ‚Ä¶

Shower Room Toilet Seat Was Not Wiped Clean At All & Really Most of The Shower Rooms At Loves TRUCK Stops This is A Ongoing Real Problem That Needs To Be Addressed immediately!! It's Still way To Much Going ON & Around For This To Go ON ‚Ä¶

Stopped to switch drivers here and get a shower. Shower was cold for a minute but got hotter. We stop here pretty regularly and it‚Äôs a nice location. I like the Love‚Äôs with McDonald‚Äôs because I use the app while I‚Äôm getting fuel and just ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ on her face was extremely rude to my daughter and mother. The bathroom was out of service, the kind woman at the front gave them a key to use the bathroom in the shower. The rude woman went and harassed them as they were leaving the ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ . They have so many choices for a snack & drink or even a quick meal. They also have very nice & clean restrooms, a place to take a shower or wash clothes. What I liked best was their very big selection of foods & snacks & drinks!!! Our ‚Ä¶
Appreciate a clean shower. Thanks

Stopped for a shower after driving all night. Waited patiently for Abt 30 minutes before I said anything and got attitude right away. So I walked to the back to see if anyone was cleaning them and some girl Bobbi was standing in the back ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ is an okay loves for truckers. Quick stop...huddle House across the street for food. Too many 4 wheelers, people, and children for it to be a comfortable stop. Not enough stalls in the bathroom, men's or woman's. Expect a wait for a shower.
‚Ä¶ Hope you don't want to get a shower today 8/4/17, between 8am-11am. they shut off the water for maintenance and only have a small sign on the door.

34 hr reset here no ice machine broke 2 days u can go to McDonalds but will charge for ice. Showers are bad shower 4. mold . handles fall off and is coming off the wall.   shower 1 is not avail it's now a storeroom for laundry. Mens room ‚Ä¶

locations.title: TA Express Travel Center
locations.content: TA Express Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Nice place but shotty construction for a new facility unlike any other TA/Petro location. Shower doesn't fit anyone over 5'10" without hitting their head. All tiles are crooked and sloppily installed, the contractor should be ashamed of ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ I‚Äôm going down the road with no hours. That $17 shower is the last money you‚Äôll ever see from me. 12 years doing this and I‚Äôve never had to worry about getting kicked out of an unmarked spot at a major truckstop. Absolutely ridiculous.

This TA Express location has tone one of the worst that I have ever visited. The from the poor plumbing in the showers to the insane amount of reserve parking. I had to stand in line to get a simple shower because the their system was not ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ I didn't catch his name but the man cleaning the showers on 6/6/24 around noon is extremely rude.  I told him my door code wasn't working and tried to show him the receipt and he cut me off and told me to go recheck my number on the screen ‚Ä¶
Had to give this TA 5 stars just because the shower cleaning guy... was very nice and let me wash my feet in his laundry room (which he really didnt have to,  but did)... ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and clean. My boyfriend got 2 orders of breadsticks and he said the breadsticks are fine but the marinara sauce that came with it was watery, didn‚Äôt really have a taste. The shower pressure was awesome. Great hot water.  Overall 3 stars.

Nice place for truckers but needs improvement in 2 areas. The app doesn't work for fueling and showers and I was forced to use the kiosk. The sink water pressure in the shower  isn't enough to rinse the razor when shaving and you can't ‚Ä¶

Restaurants closed earlier than posted hours! No hooks in showers!!! Nor anywhere to put a shower bag/ clothes besides the dirty floor. Poor lighting in showers. At all TA/Petro supposed to get 2 towels, only get 1 here and they refused to ‚Ä¶
Was going to park $20 shower $15 and eat here but couldn't get any football on the TV. Couldn't get anything on the TV. I left. May I suggest cable TV?  Large TV and nothing to watch?
First stop there. Took shower and it was so nice and clean , the hubby went and got pasta dinners for us  And the coffee was great . Definitely will be our stop off 40 from now on !!!

locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ workers. Clean area but smells very bad. Inside very clean and smell good. Truck park far from gas station, I walked 4-5 minutes under rain. Shower was clean but old. 3 stars is perfect but people who work there helped me so +1 star.

‚Ä¶ your against the self checkout you get an attitude.  However, if you get a cashier, take a shower or are interacting with any staff on the floor they are very nice super accommodating.  However, for a truck driver certain times it‚Äôs hard ‚Ä¶

It's been about 5 years since my last visit. Tony was the face I recognized still on the job. New counters and set up throughout. My shower was good but not 6'5 and taller friendly. Great coffee and nice place to stop. ‚Ä¶

I waited for an hour in line for a shower, but it never happened, the line in the program doesn't move.
the parking lot is half empty, how to drive 66 people in a line for showers

the showers are so bad you feel like you need a shower for your shower ü§¢ü•¥Truck parking is nice! Main convenience store are is clean stocked well lit and nice. Showers are short small old and yellow walls toilets was bout as clean as a port ‚Ä¶
I love pilot has almost everything u need and plus all the extras to shop for, need a shower they offer that

Easy parking, hot and full of water pressure shower! Everything was clean ish...ive seen worse. But only reason 4 stars is showers were not fully cleaned right and it's one heck of a walk from the truck parking area...like not even a option ‚Ä¶

The top 3 things that a trucker looks for at a truck stop is coffee with all the fixins, clean / stocked restrooms, and clean showers with hot water and high water pressure. This location has filthy, un-stocked restrooms and NO coffee ‚Ä¶
Do not park on the street you will get ticket. Local police will ticket you. Rested up got hot shower life is good. üôè ‚Ä¶

To all truckers please dont shower here. This is the dirtiest & nastiest shower room health department need to check this place because truckers dont deserve treatment like this. We are also human need a clean shower.
